text:
An Alleged Affair to Remember
          

          
            
              
                
              
            

            
              
                                  
                    
                  
                  
                    
                  
                  
                    Dylan Byers & Theodore Schleifer
                  
                              

              A close reading of the media melee over what did and didn’t happen between Sergey Brin, Elon Musk, and Nicole Shanahan reveals the second order consequences, near and far term.
              READ FULL STORY

Julia Alexander
                                        •
                    July 28, 2022
                  

                  The Summer Box Office Wars Come to Streaming

                  
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                    
                      The summer blockbuster showdown used to happen in IMAX theaters across the globe. And by used to, I mean all of three years ago. Yes, there was once a time when the competition between franchises, helmed by the biggest studios in Hollywood, was measured in actual ticket sales and culminated weekly in an obsessively-scrutinized Sunday […]
                      READ FULL STORY

Theodore Schleifer
                                        •
                    July 27, 2022
                  

                  Notes on the Elon-Sergey Rift

                  
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                    
                      I’ve gotten a lot of questions over the last 48 hours about the explosive story in the Wall Street Journal alleging that Elon Musk had an affair—or in peak WSJ-speak, a “liaison”—with Nicole Shanahan, who was then separating from Google co-founder Sergey Brin. (The two are now divorced.) Earlier this month, after all, Shanahan candidly […]
                      READ FULL STORY

Dylan Byers
                                        •
                    July 27, 2022
                  

                  Cuomo’s Revenge & Condé’s Numbers

                  
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                    
                      Chris Cuomo, the aggrieved former 9 p.m. occupant, First Brother and Zucker/Gollust antagonist, spent about seven months in the wilderness—some of it building a $125 million arbitration case against CNN, much of it building more muscle tone in the Hamptons—before apparently coming to the conclusion that his only path back to the broadcast studio ran […]
                      READ FULL STORY

Tara Palmeri
                                        •
                    July 28, 2022
                  

                  Oz’s Great Escape

                  
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                    
                      To the G.O.P. establishment—a club that Dr. Mehmet Oz is eager to join—the aspiring senator from Pennsylvania is running a lazy man’s campaign. He has at least one big advantage over his opponent, John Fetterman: namely his health. Fetterman, after all, has understandably been M.I.A. on the campaign trail since his stroke in mid-May, around […]

          The Kids Are All MAGA

Baratunde Thurston
            A best-selling author, podcast and television host, and cultural critic focused on the intersection of race, tech, democracy, and climate change in America.

Dylan Byers
            A veteran media reporter who has served at NBC News, CNN, and Politico, reporting on the business of media, technology, and entertainment.

Eriq Gardner
            Former legal editor-at-large at The Hollywood Reporter; now Founding Partner and National Correspondent for Puck, reporting on the intersection of law, media, Hollywood, and Wall Street.

Julia Alexander
            Julia Alexander is Director of Strategy at Parrot Analytics, where she advises clients on the tectonic shifts in tech, media, and telecom. Previously, she covered TMT at The Verge.

Julia Ioffe
            A veteran of The Atlantic, The New Yorker, and Politico reporting from Washington, D.C. on politics and media after Trump.

Matthew Belloni
            Formerly the editor of The Hollywood Reporter, and an entertainment lawyer, Belloni covers the inside conversation about money and power in Hollywood.

Peter Hamby
            Emmy award-winning journalist and host of Snapchat’s Good Luck America, reporting on politics, media, and technology.

Tara Palmeri
            A former Playbook lead author and ABC News White House Correspondent, now reporting on the convergence of Capitol Hill, K Street, the West Wing, and the D.C. media companies who cover it all.

Theodore Schleifer
            A former Recode and CNN reporter, now covering power, influence, and money in Silicon Valley.

Tina Nguyen
            Formerly a political correspondent at Politico and Vanity Fair, chronicling the egos and intrigues inside Trumpworld.

William D. Cohan
            A bestselling author, financial journalist, and former M&A banker, covering what’s really happening on Wall Street.
